page.title: 14EDUCATION:SECONDARY Cont
page.content: There are now 36 classrooms which apart from some mobile units include a language block, computer room, laboratories, new craft block,large sports hall, a purpose-built Fifth Form Centre where social studies subjects are taught. They are surrounded by 13.37 acres of playing field. Uniform consists of black blazer,black "V-neck" pullover, black shoes, blue blouse/shirt, school tie:(red,yellow, black,) black trousers,white socks for girls, black or grey for boys. Many people get to school by bus from the outlaying villages of Catfield, Hickling, Sea Palling, Ludham, Potter Heigham, Dilham, Smallburgh, Ingham, Lessingham, Happisburgh and Waxham.The rest come on foot, on bicycle,by taxi, minibus or by parental car and the older ones on motor-bike or moped.
